title: LF ranked team (silver 3 adc main)
body:
I play pretty much every night and I am looking for a serious team to get better with, don't bother if you say you are making a team and don't have planned practice times and game times because I'm not interested in a team that disbands after a week.
I main adc and can play a range of different adc's.
If I had to choose my top 3 would probably be: Ezreal, Vayne and Ashe.
Add 'Xquishy' if you're interested.
